articles.description: Privacy Commissioner Daniel Therrien tells Mercedes Stephenson that governments need to limit potential contact tracing apps for public health purposes. He s...
articles.content: Privacy Commissioner Daniel Therrien tells Mercedes Stephenson that governments need to limit potential contact tracing apps for public health purposes. He says location data should not be made public to mitigate privacy concerns with this kind of technology … [+402 chars]
